reviewText: This DVD did not meet my expectations for usage with my adolescent group therapy sessions.
I use it in D&A group.
A lot of nerve charging what they did for a 20 minute video. Not very informative. Not good for a class.
Great movie for my health class.
I showed it to my students, they said it was good but depressing and real.  They got something out of it instead of just a lecture.
